publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-32 Mr Alex Salmond: That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Ministers to publish the draft concordats with Westminster Departments, to undertake a meaningful consultation exercise with the various political groups in the Parliament and other interested parties and to report on the outcome of the consultation exercise before the end of business on 2 July. Supported by: Bruce Crawford, Roseanna Cunningham, Michael Russell, John Swinney

S1M-32 Mr Alex Salmond: That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Ministers to publish the draft concordats with Westminster Departments, to undertake a meaningful consultation exercise with the various political groups in the Parliament and other interested parties and to report on the outcome of the consultation exercise before the end of busines on 2 July. Supported by: Bruce Crawford, Roseanna Cunningham, Michael Russell, John Swinney

S1M-32 Mr Alex Salmond: Concordats—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Ministers to publish the draft concordats with Westminster Departments, to undertake a meaningful consultation exercise with the various political groups in the Parliament and other interested parties and to report on the outcome of the consultation exercise before the end of business on 2 July. (lodged on 2 June) Supported by: Bruce Crawford, Roseanna Cunningham, Michael Russell, John Swinney, Brian Adam, Roseanna Cunningham

S1M-32 Mr Alex Salmond: That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Ministers to publish the draft concordats with Westminster Departments, to undertake a meaningful consultation exercise with the various political groups in the Parliament and other interested parties and to report on the outcome of the consultation exercise before the end of business on 2 July. (lodged on 2 June 1999) Supported by: Bruce Crawford, Roseanna Cunningham, Michael Russell, John Swinney, Brian Adam

S1M-32 Mr Alex Salmond: That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Ministers to publish the draft concordats with Westminster Departments, to undertake a meaningful consultation exercise with the various political groups in the Parliament and other interested parties and to report on the outcome of the consultation exercise before the end of business on 2 July. (lodged on 2 June 1999) Supported by: Bruce Crawford, Roseanna Cunningham, Michael Russell, John Swinney, Brian Adam

S1M-32 Mr Alex Salmond: Concordats—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Ministers to publish the draft concordats with Westminster Departments, to undertake a meaningful consultation exercise with the various political groups in the Parliament and other interested parties and to report on the outcome of the consultation exercise before the end of business on 2 July. (lodged on 2 June 1999) Supported by: Bruce Crawford, Roseanna Cunningham, Michael Russell, John Swinney, Brian Adam, Roseanna Cunningham

S1M-32 Mr Alex Salmond: That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Ministers to publish the draft concordats with Westminster Departments, to undertake a meaningful consultation exercise with the various political groups in the Parliament and other interested parties and to report on the outcome of the consultation exercise before the end of busines on 2 July. Supported by: Bruce Crawford, Roseanna Cunningham, Michael Russell, John Swinney

S1M-32 Mr Alex Salmond: That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Ministers to publish the draft concordats with Westminster Departments, to undertake a meaningful consultation exercise with the various political groups in the Parliament and other interested parties and to report on the outcome of the consultation exercise before the end of business on 2 July. Supported by: Bruce Crawford, Roseanna Cunningham, Michael Russell, John Swinney
